info.title: Characteristic Data for Classification
info.description: Characteristics describe attributes of the objects to be classified. Using the API you can maintain characteristic header data, descriptions, references, restrictions and values.

x-sap-shortText: Create, read, update, and delete characteristic data with this synchronous inbound service

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: Filter items by property values, see [Filtering](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=64)

post.description: Creates a characteristic header data using characteristic name. Providing data type, status and a description in the same request is mandatory. Other fields might also be required depending on the selected data type.

parameters.name: CharcInternalID
parameters.description: Characteristic Internal ID

get.summary: Characteristic header data for a given key.
get.description: Reads a characteristic header data by the internal ID.

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=68)

patch.description: Updates the header data of a characteristic selected by the internal ID.

delete.description: Deletes a characteristic by the internal ID.

parameters.description: Characteristic Internal ID

post.description: Creates a characteristic description using the internal ID of the characteristic and a language. In case the language is not provided, the logon language is used.

parameters.name: Language
parameters.description: Language Key

patch.description: Updates the description of a characteristic defined by the internal ID and the language.

delete.description: Deletes the description of a characteristic defined by the internal ID and the language.

post.description: Creates a characteristic value description using a language, the position number of the value and the internal ID of the characteristic. In case the language is not provided, the logon language is used.

parameters.name: CharcInternalID
parameters.description: Characteristic Internal ID

parameters.name: CharcValuePositionNumber
parameters.description: Int counter

parameters.name: Language
parameters.description: Language Key

get.summary: Characteristic value description for a given key.
get.description: Reads a characteristic value description on a selected language using the position number of the value and the internal ID of the characteristic.

parameters.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=68)

patch.description: Updates a characteristic value description using a language, the position number of the value and the internal ID of the characteristic.

delete.description: Deletes a characteristic value description using a language, the position number of the value and the internal ID of the characteristic.

get.description: Reads all characteristic values. You can also get values for a selected characteristic.
